<<<api>>>: Map.entrySet()
<<<code>>>: for (Map.Entry<String, Integer> entry : map.entrySet()) {
String key = entry.getKey();
Integer value = entry.getValue();
// Do something with key and value
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use Map.entrySet() to get a set of key-value pairs from a map, and then iterate over them using a for-each loop. This will allow you to access each key-value pair in the map and perform operations on them.
